# Miro Integration

> **Source**: [https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration)

**Product**: Integrations

**Last Crawled**: 2026-01-27T20:48:25.532516

---

On this page

* * *

Miro is a cloud-based collaborative whiteboard platform helping teams to manage their projects effectively. Miro gives the team access to digital whiteboards and sticky notes to enable them to brainstorm and do many other collaborative activities such as research, planning, managing workflows and more.

TestMu AI's integration with Miro will help you to log bugs to boards on Miro. You can easily find and report any cross browser compatibility issues to your team instantly.

## How To Integrate Miro With Your TestMu AI Account?[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration#how-to-integrate-miro-with-your--account "Direct link to how-to-integrate-miro-with-your--account")

* * *

**Step 1:** Login to your TestMu AI account. Select 'integration' from the left navigation bar. This page includes all the integrations provided with 3rd party tools for TestMu AI. You'll find Miro under the Project Management category. Hover on it and you'll see a plus icon, click on it go further with integration

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/1-e6f32d571635b568ac3dcaad60638d4d.webp)

**Step 2:** If you've already logged into your Miro account, you'll be taken to another screen asking to install 'TestMu AI' in your team. You can click on the 'install' icon next to 'test'.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/2-c30d1ac5ea5f1aed0a5fbfa40513cfd6.webp)

**Step 3:** After you click on the install button, the integration of TestMu AI will be completed. You can verify the integration by selecting 'integrations' from the left navigation bar, here under the 'My Integration' section you can see 'Miro'.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/3-444759fa9465518ef5c528993a6a1970.webp)

**Step 4:** If you are not already logged in, then you will be redirected to a page where you can log in with your Miro account by providing login credentials. You can even use your google account to login to Miro.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/4-7a5d76867116ce8c63faedddba092e82.webp)

## Log Your First Bug From TestMu AI Integration With Miro[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration#log-your-first-bug-from--integration-with-miro "Direct link to log-your-first-bug-from--integration-with-miro")

* * *

**Step 1:** Choose the type of test from the left navigation menu. For now, let's go with the "Real-Time" Test"

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/5-af976ec499ff2bab9b702326d69192d8.webp)

**Step 2:** Enter your URL in the "Place your URL" dialog box. Choose the browser and OS Configuration you want to test on and click on 'Start'.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/6-a9042ed747702772e3cb7c8e2b7dbb9d.webp)

**Step 3:** After the Virtual Machine is created and launched, you can perform manual tests on your Web-Application in the live environment to find bugs. When a bug is identified, click on the 'Mark as Bug' icon on the left panel to capture the screenshot.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/7-d5b6845950a43755d14061a877f63ffd.webp)

**Step 4:** After capturing the screenshot, you can mark the issues identified on the page with the help of the in-built image editor. After highlighting the bug, click on the "Mark as Bug" button.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/8-32f90c190423ef858b310ccc4485e031.webp)

**Step 5:** A Miro tracker form would pop up to log the issue, you can fill the fields as per the case and click on 'create issue'.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/9-14aad58346ffacdc6a77f3695b167380.webp)

**Step 6:** The logged task can now be seen as a part of your board in your Miro Project. You can access your board in the dashboard under 'All boards'.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/10-e1487316065bc1782a651bf478539331.webp)

**Step 7:** After logging into your board, you can see your task created on the board.

![Miro Integration](data:image/webp;base64,)

**Step 8:** Upon clicking on the task, you will be able to view all the details you entered while logging the bug on TestMu AI. You'll be able to see the screenshot of the bug along with the configuration you tested on

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/12-9a4fff59a9e189a46ad8352184672b03.webp)

## Remove TestMu AI Integration With Miro[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration#remove--integration-with-miro "Direct link to remove--integration-with-miro")

* * *

### On TestMu AI's Platform[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration#on-s-platform "Direct link to on-s-platform")

* * *

In case you want to remove your Miro integration with TestMu AI, Here is how you can do that.

**Step 1:** Log in to your TestMu AI account.

**Step 2:** From the left navigation menu click on Integration. Under the My Integration section, you can see a remove button next to your Miro integration. By clicking on the remove button you can remove the integration.

> **Note** : While removing the integration make sure you do the same from Miro so that you'll be able to integrate TestMu AI with Miro again.

### On Miro's Platform[â](https://www.testmuai.com/support/docs/miro-integration#on-miros-platform "Direct link to On Miro's Platform")

**Step 1:** Log in to your Miro account. Click on the profile icon on the top left corner and click on settings

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/13-5941013f98be3bb2a3cb949fad8989cf.webp)

**Step 2:** Click on Select 'Apps and Integrations' from the left navigation bar. Further, scroll down to "Installed Apps" and click on the TestMu AI icon.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/14-369dd87c56da500d993c6f645cfb437d.webp)

**Step 3:** Under Apps & Integrations, scroll down and you'll see the user history for the installation. Next to it you'll see the option 'uninstall for me'.

![Miro Integration](https://www.testmuai.com/support/assets/images/15-3c2991c2bb1a5cf693041bd29f6dc844.webp)

That was all you need to know for integrating TestMu AI with Miro. In case you have any doubts or questions, feel free to share them with our product experts on **24/7 chat support**. Happy testing! ð
